abstract: Lawyers for Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev request one-month suspension of trial because of parallels with terrorist attacks in France.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for the defendant, Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, requested a one-month suspension in the case, citing the parallels between the Boston Marathon bombings and last week’s terrorist attacks in France.
snippet: Lawyers for the defendant, Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, requested a one-month suspension in the case, citing the parallels between the Boston Marathon bombings and last week’s terrorist attacks in France.

headline.main: Defense Asks for Delay in Boston Bombings Trial
headline.print_headline: Defense Asks for Delay in Boston Bombings Trial
